title: Rank ended ealier than other servers
body: Literally like 4 games off promotion and thought that i still had one day left so left it till that day and ended. Why ending season earlier than other servers? so not fair

replies.body:
Oceania is 1 day ahead in usually all things.  We get patches and new champs/skins a day before everyone else.
and it also means we likely started this season, 1 day before everyone else, so it really wouldn't have been fair if we had more days than other servers.

the information has been on the league of legends client home page for well over a month.
you cant be angry at riot for giving you all the information you need at your finger tips and not bothering to check

but i am sorry to hear that you missed your goals, that would be frustrating.
There's people saying it ends at midnight tonight. Not sure what's going on tbh.

To be fair, we started our season before other servers.

It has to do with time zones.

While the difference in time-zones means that OCE is generally about 6-18 hours ahead of most other servers, that's not what has happened here. It seems that every server has had their ranked season end on the 7th (today) in their respective time-zone, despite all the information Riot giving us about the season ending on the 8th (tomorrow).

I'll agree, it's stupid of Riot to be telling the entirety of the community the one date leading up to the end of the season, then change it to the day before with no notice whatsoever. Not to mention, last season also ended on the 8th of November, which would make people further think this season would too (especially being told it would).
